TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit MsmqIntegrationBinding extends System.ServiceModel.MsmqBindingBase

Docs.summary: The MsmqIntegrationBinding class maps Microsoft Message Queuing (MSMQ) messages to [!INCLUDE[indigo1](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] messages.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This binding can be used to enable [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] applications to send and receive messages to and from existing MSMQ applications that use COM, native C++ APIs or the types defined in the <xref:System.Messaging> namespace.
## Examples The following configuration file snippet illustrates how to configure the MsmqIntegrationBinding binding on the client:
[!code-cs[XpsCreate#XpsCreateAddPkgContent](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/XpsCreate/XpsCreate.cs#xpscreateaddpkgcontent)]
The following configuration file snippet illustrates how to configure the MsmqIntegrationBinding binding on the service:
[!code-cs[S_MSMQToWCF#1](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.ms_0_2.cs)] [!code-vb[S_MSMQToWCF#1](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.servicemodel.ms_0_2.vb)]
The following code illustrates how to use the MsmqIntegrationBinding binding on the service programmatically:
[!code-cs[S_MSMQToWCF#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.ms_0_3.cs)] [!code-vb[S_MSMQToWCF#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.servicemodel.ms_0_3.vb)]
The following code illustrates how to use the MsmqIntegrationBinding binding on the client programmatically:
[!code-cs[S_WCFToMsmq#2](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/t-system.servicemodel.ms_0_4.cs)] [!code-vb[S_WCFToMsmq#2](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/t-system.servicemodel.ms_0_4.vb)]

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method enables you to instantiate a new instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> and pass in a security mode.
## Examples The following code illustrates how to instantiate an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> binding, specifying the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurityMode>:
[!code-cs[S_WCFToMsmq#5](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/88c67173-5246-4611-9ec1-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[S_WCFToMsmq#5](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/88c67173-5246-4611-9ec1-_1.vb)]

Docs.exception: The value is not within the range of values.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig specialname rtspecialname instance void .ctor(string configurationName) cil managed

Docs.param: The value of the attribute that identifies the element whose settings are used to initialize the binding.
Docs.summary: Initializes a new instance of the class from the settings of a specified configuration binding element.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This method allows you to place the binding settings in a configuration file but add the actual binding in code.
## Examples The following code shows how to create an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> binding and initialize it by passing in the name of the binding element:
[!code-cs[S_WCFToMsmq#3](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/2248b8d7-a573-44f7-8b89-_1.cs)] [!code-vb[S_WCFToMsmq#3](~/add/codesnippet/visualbasic/2248b8d7-a573-44f7-8b89-_1.vb)]

Docs.summary: Returns the binding elements in the basic profile stack.
Docs.returns: The <xref:System.ServiceModel.Channels.BindingElementCollection> that contains the stack of binding elements in the basic profile stack.

Docs.summary: Gets the that is associated with this binding.
Docs.value: The that is associated with this binding.

remarks.format: ## Remarks <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationSecurity> encapsulates Message Queuing (MSMQ) transport security settings.

Docs.summary: Gets or sets the serialization format to be used to serialize or deserialize the message.
Docs.value: A object that represents the type of serialization to use.

remarks.format:
## Remarks This property returns an enumeration value that specifies how a [!INCLUDE[indigo2](~/add/includes/ajax-current-ext-md.md)] message will be serialized and deserialized. For more information, see <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqMessageSerializationFormat>.
## Examples The following code illustrates how to set the serialization format on an instance of the <xref:System.ServiceModel.MsmqIntegration.MsmqIntegrationBinding> class:
[!code-cs[S_WCFToMsmq#4](~/add/codesnippet/csharp/a03877ea-a369-46a3-9130-_1.cs)]

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance bool ShouldSerializeSecurity() cil managed

Docs.summary: Gets a value that specifies whether security information should be serialized.
Docs.returns: if security information should be serialized; otherwise .
